name: Perfect Jazz
description:
This is a top scrolling shooter in the style of the 80s and 90s arcade games. Collect coins to upgrade your ship between levels. Flip your ship using spacebar.  Big shootout to Carlos who did the bulk of the coding. Also to Thomas and Graeme for all your help getting it to work properly

Github Repo

https://github.com/MorbidCuriosity84/PerfectJazz
